abstract: Along with the New York modernist landmark, 65 other sites were placed on the 2102 World Monuments Watch, a list of endangered cultural heritage sites across the globe.
snippet: Along with the New York modernist landmark, 65 other sites were placed on the 2102 World Monuments Watch, a list of endangered cultural heritage sites across the globe.
lead_paragraph: The 1954 glass box at 510 Fifth Avenue is among the cultural heritage sites at risk, according to the annual list assembled by the World Monuments Fund, which was released on Wednesday. Noting that the controversial renovation of the building at 43rd Street, a branch of what was then the Manufacturers Hanover Trust Company, has been the subject of a court dispute, the fund said the case "raises questions about the legality of recent alterations and the capacity of the New York City Landmarks Commission to enforce protective regulations."

headline.main: World Monuments Fund Places Manufacturers Hanover Building on At-Risk List
